resources.string: New Baby Quiz, Are you ready
This is a quiz that will help you decide if you\'re ready for a new baby.
Next
How do you handle body fluids?
EWWW BARF
Meh, we all make them.
Cluttered floors, tables, chairs, car, everthing.
panic attack
it\'ll be clean when they grow up
Intrusive comments/advice from everyone around you and online?
Verbally abusing the next person to give you advice.
Listen carefully and considerately while pondering their completely contrary suggestions.
Dr.s appointments. LOTS OF THEM.
Don\'t they have a program where someone else sits in line for me?
I\'ve got books for me and the kids, let do this.
How do you like free time?
my personal time is important to me above all else.
I prefer having a tiny dictator version of me arranging my schedule for me.
You finished the quiz here\'s your answer below.
Perhaps your\'e not quite ready for a baby. However this is just a silly quiz so if you want ot have kids go for it.
You\'ve got some maturity to you. Having kids shouldn\'t be a major life changer for you.
You answered every question perfectly, you\'re ready for kids or more kids.
